snippet: The Paris prosecutor’s office said independent judges would investigate charges that French troops sexually abused children in the Central African Republic.
lead_paragraph: The Paris prosecutor’s office said independent judges would investigate charges that French troops sexually abused children in the Central African Republic.

headline.main: France Opens Criminal Inquiry Into Charges of Abuse by Peacekeepers in Africa

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Nations Department of Peacekeeping Operations
